string.name: recognition_text_content_one
string.value: [Traffic Notification] Dear customer, your traffic bill for February 2024 has been sent. Click to view the bill details: https://developer.harmonyos.com/. Reply R to reject the bill.

string.name: recognition_text_content_two
string.value: [Email] You have a new email. Please log in to your mailbox alltoplayerstart@qq.com to check it. Reply R to reject it.
